title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Broncos head coach Nathaniel Hackett for admitting his costly mistake at the end of their loss to the Seahawks in Russell Wilson's first game with Denver. He compares Trey Lance to Tim Tebow and what this means for the 49ers this season. He also believes he figured out why Tom Brady hasn't retired yet. Plus, Fox Sports College Football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show in studio to explain why USC could be a legitimate playoff contender and what makes this year's Texas team different. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
